document.full_text: peru's ruling party gave its backing to presidential candidate pedro pablo kuczynski on saturday, a day before peruvians vote in the first round of an election that a left-wing nationalist is favored to win.
document.title: peru ruling party backs ex-banker in election race
lines_and_colors: peru's ruling party gave its backing to presidential candidate pedro pablo kuczynski on saturday, a day before peruvians vote in the first round of an election that a left-wing nationalist is favored to win.
